com.ooyala.android.ads.vast

Class VASTHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ooyala.android.ads.vast.VASTHelper

  • public class VASTHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a static helper class to deserialize a VMAP XML document into VMAP ad spots.

    • Constructor Summary

      VASTHelper()

      static boolean parse(org.w3c.dom.Element e, java.util.List<VASTAdSpot> spots, int duration)
      Parse a VMAP XML element according to the spec and generates a list of VASTAdSpots

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public static boolean parse(org.w3c.dom.Element e,
                            java.util.List<VASTAdSpot> spots,
                            int duration)
        Parse a VMAP XML element according to the spec and generates a list of VASTAdSpots
        Parameters:
        e - the root element of the VMAP XML
        spots - a list of vast ad spots as output
        duration - the content duration, used to compute percentage time offset
        Returns:
        true if pass succeeds, false if failed
